channel.title: What are you getting for christmas?
channel.description:
Hey guys i don't know if this was posted before and if it was it's way back in pages and im just wondering what everyone is getting for christmas or what they got for past holidays!
Im getting an Xbox 360 elite Halo 3 call of duty 4 skate and a lot of other games and a mac book pro for my college years!

sdfu kiddies

I actually have no idea why you posted that, its like you didnt read the “if you want to flame me anymore then pm me” as in ending the arguement, and you posted that like 1 and a half days after it ended…

Beanbag, gtfo pls. We all hate you.

Oh dang, im hated by a bunch of Moparscape fags
[/quote]you are a moparscape fag

exept im not, i havent been there since like febuary

you still are one though. It is a fact of life that any person’s username containing “TheBeanie” is a fag.[/quote]

Wow, Well thats your oppinion you and all the other moparscape fags tbh i dont really give a shit.
